title: So patch 7.9 abilities clarity
body:
The tank updates have gone through, awesome, but their preview in the game client have not been updated, the new ability icons are there, but the short clips of the abilities have old footage, {{champion:57}} now old ult, {{champion:154}} old q and ult, and the same for {{champion:113}} abilities.

I know its all online and viewable on all the pbe videos and even in the patch notes, but just for the sake of clarity (and the fact some players just don't watch for the info), someone may want to see the new abilities from the patch notes, go to collection and look at the champs, only to see new ability icons, but no visual change, only description and name.

Just for the sake of clarity.

Lets make the client better!!!

replies.body: It looks like the videos in the collections tab have the updated abilities now.
